channel.title: Help: How can I make the saradomin sword special hit X4 insted of X2
channel.description:
It's a fast special so if I did X4 it would be a great pking weapon/rarest weapon in game.
Look at the special: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Os2AJ3xfu-s
